content: For this assignment, you will receive a sentence and your task is to replace a specific word in the sentence with its antonym while retaining the sentence's original meaning. Specifically, you will be presented with a statement about an actress who was allegedly very sociable. Your objective is to replace the word "outgoing" with its antonym.
Certainly! If the original sentence is, "The actress was very outgoing," you can replace "outgoing" with its antonym to get: "The actress was very reserved."
